alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 08 at 11:27AM EDT until May 10 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio... Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River near Linn Grove. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The flooding of county roads begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM EDT Sunday was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
